questions.question: What are 'Opening hours'?
options: The time when the bank is closed
The time when the bank is available for customers
The lunch break of the employees
The time the manager arrives at home
questions.explanation: Opening hours are the hours during which a business is open to the public.

questions.question: Select the correct plural form: 'The banks ________ on Saturdays.'
questions.explanation: With plural subjects (the banks), we don't add 's' to the verb.

questions.question: Which day is part of the 'Weekend'?
questions.explanation: The weekend consists of Saturday and Sunday.

questions.question: Complete the sentence: 'The ATM ________ 24 hours a day.'
questions.explanation: The ATM (It) takes the 's' ending in the present simple.
